statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{2} + 1 , -4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 3 , 12 \, x^{3} - 18 \, x^{2} - 12 \, x + 6 , -6 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - x , 12 \, x^{3} - 12 \, x^{2} - 12 \, x + 8\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
